definition: Ministry of Railways (MOR), disbanded in 2013 with its regulatory functions taken over by the Ministry of Transport 交通運輸部|交通运输部[Jiao1 tong1 Yun4 shu1 bu4]
iron (metal)/arms/weapons/hard/strong/violent/unshakeable/determined/close/tight (slang)
surname Tie

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The Railway Ministry has also ordered a two-month safety review of railway operations.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道部長也已經下令將開展爲期兩個月的安全檢查。

sentences.english: I commend the indian railways for thier strong and positive stand.
sentences.chinese: 我很贊同印度鐵道部這種堅定的立場。

sentences.english: It told the news agency Xinhua the ministry still enjoys strong government support.
sentences.chinese: 大公對新華社說，鐵道部依然享有政府的強有力支持。

sentences.english: China's railway minister, Sheng Guangzu, was reported to have rushed to the scene.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，中國鐵道部部長盛光祖已經火速趕往現場。

sentences.english: Online demands abound that the railway minister, Sheng Guangzu, lose his job too.
sentences.chinese: 網絡熱呼鐵道部長盛光祖引咎辭職。

sentences.english: Mr. Ghulam Muhammad Bilor Pakistani Railways Minister, should be sent to China for some times only.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦鐵道部長應當去中國待一段時間。

sentences.english: Railways ministry spokesman dismissed from office.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道部發言人王勇平離任。

sentences.english: Will the railway minister introduce a train that would travel in 5 hours?
sentences.chinese: 鐵道部是否能引進一種能在5小時內跑完的火車？

sentences.english: The Ministry of Railways said train T195 derailed from the track before the collision.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道部稱T195次列車在相撞前已出軌。

sentences.english: Ministry of Railways relevant departments and units directly under the charge of people take part in the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道部有關司局和直屬單位負責人蔘加了會議。

sentences.english: Joint Venture Division of Development and Planning.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道部發展計劃司合資處。

sentences.english: Article 3 The connection of special railway lines with national railways must be approved by the Ministry of Railways.
sentences.chinese: 第三條鐵路專用線與國鐵接軌必須經鐵道部批准。

sentences.english: The official state media took Mr. Wen’s broadside as a pass to keep digging into Railways Ministry incompetence.
sentences.chinese: 官方國家媒體藉此繼續調查鐵道部的失職。

sentences.english: After a meeting sponsored by the people from the ministry, all of us attended an exam.
sentences.chinese: 會後，全體報名的人員參加了鐵道部派員舉行的考試。

sentences.english: S. high-speed railways, " Wang Zhiguo, a deputy railways minister, told a news conference."
sentences.chinese: 王治國，一位鐵道部副部長在一個記者招待會上說。

sentences.english: Online, many have demanded the dismissal of the new railway minister, Sheng Guangzu.
sentences.chinese: 在網絡上，許多人要求撤掉鐵道部長盛光祖。

mutiny/(Tw) to be dumped by one's girlfriend while serving in the army

Korean War (1950-1953)
army grouping/collective army
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms

hot potato/problem/trouble/headache

to throw one's life in for/to haplessly give one's life for/to sacrifice oneself torturously working for another or for a group/to pour in one's utmost effort/to shed one's last ounce of strength for
